statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM WeatherData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location, MAX(rainfall) AS max_rainfall FROM WeatherData GROUP BY location
SELECT id, location, date FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 50 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT location, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York' AND rainfall > 0.5 ORDER BY rainfall DESC
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 OR wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_type = 'temperature_sensor' ORDER BY installation_location;
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY location;

SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, installation_location FROM sensor_devices WHERE installation_location LIKE 'Indoor%' AND device_type IN ('temperature_sensor', 'humidity_sensor') ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analysis_date FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' AND location='Room 1'
SELECT analysis_id, data_id, analysis_result, DATE_FORMAT(analysis_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM data_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location='City A' AND pressure < 1000
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM weather_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_stations WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location FROM weather_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM weather_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_measurements WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT station_id, alert_timestamp, alert_type, alert_message FROM weather_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, altitude FROM WeatherStation ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT model, serial_number FROM SensorDevice WHERE model = 'A12345';
SELECT observation, analysis_result FROM WeatherAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData JOIN WeatherStation ON WeatherData.id = WeatherStation.id WHERE altitude > 1000
SELECT model, observation FROM SensorDevice JOIN WeatherObservation ON SensorDevice.id = WeatherObservation.sensor_device_id WHERE observation LIKE '%rain%'
SELECT id, location, altitude FROM WeatherStation WHERE altitude BETWEEN 500 AND 1500 ORDER BY altitude ASC
SELECT observation_id, analysis_result FROM WeatherAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'severe thunderstorm'
